section.title: Using MongoMinKey as a value
section.programlisting:
<?php

$collection->insert(array("task" => "lunch", "do by" => new MongoMinKey));
$collection->insert(array("task" => "staff meeting", "do by" => new MongoDate(strtotime("+4 days"))));

$cursor = $collection->find()->sort(array("do by" => 1));

?>
section.para: The cursor will contain the lunch document, then the staff meeting document. The lunch document will always be returned first, regardless of what else is added to the collection (unless other documents are added with MongoMinKey in the "do by" field).
